quotes.author: Steve Maraboli
quotes.text: Letting go means to come to the realization that some people are a part of your history, but not a part of your destiny.

quotes.author: Anais Nin
quotes.text: Life shrinks or expands in porportion to one's courage

quotes.author: Albert Einstein
quotes.text: There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle.

quotes.author: Oscar Wilde
quotes.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt
quotes.text: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.

quotes.author: Paulo Coelho
quotes.text: And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.

quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes.text: Do what you feel in your heart to be right – for you’ll be criticized anyway.

quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV
quotes.text: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.

quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln
quotes.text: Whatever you are, be a good one.

quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes.text: Always do what you are afraid to do.

quotes.author: Mahatma Ghandi
quotes.text: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.

quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn
quotes.text: The most important thing is to enjoy your life—to be happy—it's all that matters.

quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer
quotes.text: You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness.

quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett
quotes.text: It’s only after you’ve stepped outside your comfort zone that you begin to change, grow, and transform.

quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett
quotes.text: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.

quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett
quotes.text: Pursue what catches your heart, not what catches your eyes.

quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett
quotes.text: Believe in yourself. You are braver than you think, more talented than you know, and capable of more than you imagine.

quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett
quotes.text: Start each day with a positive thought and a grateful heart.
